scripts.build: pnpm install && pnpm build:core && pnpm build:noncore
scripts.build:core: pnpm -r --workspace-concurrency 1 -F core -F ai -F flow -F dotprompt build
scripts.pack:all: (mkdir ../dist || true) && npm-run-all pack:core pack:flow pack:ai pack:dotprompt pack:plugins pack:third_party
scripts.pack:plugins: for i in plugins/*/; do cd $i && pnpm pack --pack-destination ../../../dist && cd ../..; done
scripts.pack:third_party: for i in third_party/*/; do cd $i && pnpm pack --pack-destination ../../../dist && cd ../..; done
